title: Buying Greenland
summary: Trump seriously proposed that the United States purchase Greenland from Denmark. When Denmark said it wasn't for sale, Trump canceled state visit and called Danish PM's response 'nasty.'
keyFacts: August 2019: Seriously proposed that United States purchase Greenland from Denmark
When Denmark said Greenland wasn't for sale, Trump canceled state visit
Greenland is an autonomous territory with its own government - not Denmark's to sell
Greenland's premier: 'We are not for sale'
Trump appeared genuinely interested in the real estate transaction
